item.title: Selection mechanism design
item.description: ⊕ Dewhurst, David Rushing, Michael Vincent Arnold, and Colin Michael Van Oort, 2018, Selection mechanism design affects volatility in a market of evolving zero-intelligence agents, arXiv:1812.05657 [cs, q-fin]. Here’s an interesting paper from Dewherst, Arnold, and Van Oort published to arXiv. Dewherst et al. use an evolving multi-agent landscape to model evolutionary selection mechanisms applicable to markets. ⊕ Lo, Andrew W, 2004, The Adaptive Markets Hypothesis, Journal of Portfolio Management, 15.
